messages.title: UKIP Standing Up for the NHS
messages.content: UKIP pledges Â£3 billion more for the NHS. How Labour privatised the NHS and how UKIP will save it, for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to ensure the NHS is always there for the benefit of the people of this country, protect and reinstate state enrolled nurses, curb benefit tourism, and keep the NHS out of the EU's TTIP agreement.

issues.brexitEurope: Keep the NHS out of the EU's TTIP agreement.
issues.health: UKIP will fight to ensure the NHS is always there for the benefit of the people of this country.

images.caption: UKIP Standing Up for the NHS leaflet image

leaflet.additionalNotes: The NHS works in spite of Labour, not because of it.
